p: Our first patient revealed a small-bowel obstruction. It was caused by the volvulus of the small-bowel around the diverticular axis. The frequency of intestinal obstruction due to a fibrous band of the vitelline duct as in our first case is very rare ( 11). However, if the diagnosis and surgical treatment are delayed, the intestines might become gangrenous and the intestinal resection is unavoidable ( 11).
